Name: Berries Challenge
About the game: Berries Challenge is a berries hunter simulator. Here you can walk around the forest and enjoy nature, meet different animals and, of course, gather berries. The goal of the game is not only to gather as many flowers as possible but also to find the way back to the car without any modern equipment. Only the best berries hunters are able to cope with this. Main Game Features: - look for berries, - pick as many berries as you can, - enjoy nature, - walk as long as you want, - watch forest animals, - find the way back.
